name: AMBASSADORSOFCHRIST
0:
”Alexa, open ambassadors of christ”
”Alexa, ask ambassadors of christ for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start ambassadors of christ”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambassadors of christ
des: Listen to Ambassadors of Christ from I AM STREAMING. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created by RobinLynnes Productions for I AM STREAMING.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
